trans-unit.source: Represents a security token that is based upon an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509 인증서를 기반으로 하는 보안 토큰을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: To get the details of the X.509 certificate, access the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: X.509 인증서의 세부 정보를 얻으려면 액세스는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref> class using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"> </xref> 클래스 지정된 된 X.509 인증서를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a unique identifier for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token and assigns that value to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자에 대 한 고유 식별자를 만들어는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>보안 토큰 및 해당 값 할당은 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> X.509 인증서를 포함 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate*>

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref> class using the specified X.509 certificate and unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"> </xref> 클래스 지정 된 X.509 인증서 및 고유 식별자를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> X.509 인증서를 포함 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate*>

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 보안 토큰의 고유 식별자입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id*>

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: -or- id is null.
trans-unit.target: -또는- id null입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 보안 토큰과 연결 된 X.509 인증서를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Certificate property to get the details about the X.509 certificate associated with the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: 와 연결 된 X.509 인증서에 대 한 세부 정보를 가져올 인증서 속성을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>보안 토큰입니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: For instance, the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate can be accessed using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Thumbprint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, X.509 인증서의 지문을 통해 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Thumbprint%2A>속성.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Thumbprint%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> X.509 인증서를 포함 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 모든 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Call the Dispose method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> 를 사용 하 여 작업을 마쳤으면 Dispose 메서드를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 메서드는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>불안정 한 상태가.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: After calling the Dispose method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 메서드를 호출한 후에 대 한 모든 참조를 해제 해야는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>가비지 수집기는 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>차지한.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> 에 대 한 마지막 참조를 해제 하기 전에 항상 호출 삭제

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 중인 리소스가 가비지 수집기 호출할 때까지 해제 되지 것입니다 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>개체의 `Finalize` 메서드.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 보안 토큰의 고유 식별자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 보안 토큰의 고유 식별자입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the key identifier for this instance is equal to the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스의 키 식별자가 지정 된 키 식별자와 같은지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The MatchesKeyIdentifierClause method matches criteria in the X.509 certificate in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property based on the type of the `keyIdentifierClause` parameter.
trans-unit.target: MatchesKeyIdentifierClause 메서드의 X.509 인증서의 조건과 일치는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A>속성의 형식에 따라는 `keyIdentifierClause` 매개 변수.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table details what is matched.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 일치 비교 항목에 대해 자세히 설명 합니다.

trans-unit.source: |Key identifier clause type|What is matched| |--------------------------------|---------------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>|The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A> property and the issuer serial number returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A> method.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>|The data returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetRawCertData%2A> method.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>|The subject key identifier extension in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A> property is matched.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>|The thumbprint that is returned by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A> method.|
trans-unit.target: | 키 식별자 절 형식 | 일치 비교 항목 | |--------------------------------|---------------------| | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>| <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A>메서드에서 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A>속성 및 발급자 일련 번호의 값이 반환 됩니다. | | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>| <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetRawCertData%2A>메서드에서 반환 된 데이터입니다. | | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>| 주체 키 식별자 확장 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A>속성에 일치 됩니다. | | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>| 반환 되는 지문은 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A>메서드. |</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetRawCertData%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to compare to this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref> 이 인스턴스와 비교할 합니다.

trans-unit.source: if keyIdentifierClause is one of the , , , or types and the key identifier clauses match; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if keyIdentifierClause is one of the , , , or types and the key identifier clauses match; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 보안 토큰과 연결 된 암호화 키를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the SecurityKeys property to set the cryptographic keys for this security token to protect a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: SecurityKeys 속성을 사용 하 여 SOAP 메시지를 보호 하려면이 보안 토큰에 대 한 암호화 키를 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The keys can be used, among other things, to digitally sign or encrypt SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: 키 데 사용할 수, 특히, 디지털 서명 또는 SOAP 메시지를 암호화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref> that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> 형식의 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"> </xref> 보안 토큰과 연결 된 키 집합이 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the ThrowIfDisposed method has been called for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스에 대 한 ThrowIfDisposed 메서드가 호출 된 경우 예외를 throw 합니다.

trans-unit.source: the ThrowIfDisposed method has been called for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스에 대 한 ThrowIfDisposed 메서드가 호출 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 시작을이 보안 토큰이 유효한 시간을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The ValidFrom property is specified in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and is the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotBefore%2A> property of the X.509 certificate specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ValidFrom 속성을 utc (협정 세계시)로 지정 되며 값은 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotBefore%2A>속성에 지정 된 X.509 인증서는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotBefore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the instant in time at which this security token is first valid.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>시작 시간을이 보안 토큰이 먼저 유효한 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 이 보안 토큰이 유효한 시간을 마지막을 종료 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is specified in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and is the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotAfter%2A> property of the X.509 certificate specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>속성을 utc (협정 세계시)로 지정 되며 값은 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotAfter%2A>속성에 지정 된 X.509 인증서는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotAfter%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>하는 마지막 종료 나타내는이 보안 토큰이 유효한 시간을.</xref:System.DateTime>
